head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ARSENAULT, ALFRED JUDE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ARSENAULT, ALFRED JUDE

block.p: ARSENAULT-Alfred Jude. Of East Norwich, NY, formerly of Williston Park, NY, on May 12, 2000. Founder and President of Insight Consulting Company. Beloved father of Jeanne Keeling, Jane Arsenault, Nancy Arsenault, Patricia Gerraputa, Barbara Vicino, James and Thomas Arsenault. Loving grandfather of six grandchildren. Dear brother of Jeanette Winant and Dave Arsenault. Visiting Monday, 2-5 and 7-9 PM, at Weigand Bros Funeral Home, 49 Hillside Ave, Williston Park, NY. Funeral Mass Tuesday, 10 AM, at St. Aidan's R.C. Church. Interment Holy Rood Cemetery.

ARSENAULT-Alfred Jude. Of East Norwich, NY, formerly of Williston Park, NY, on May 12, 2000. Founder and President of Insight Consulting Company. Funeral Mass Tuesday, 10 AM, at St. Aidan's R.C. Church. Interment Holy Rood Cemetery.
